archimate:ApplicationInterface.name: GR Interface; DB Schenker SAP --> Vestas SAP
archimate:ApplicationInterface.documentation:
Schenker is posting goods receipt. This information is interfaced to Vestas using the IDoc MBGMCR02 --> During the GR confirmation all serial No. relevant items should be consolidated by Schenker: Schenker activated Batch Management for the SN relevant items (1SN = 1 Batch-No.). Because of batch split on Schenker side the consolidation is necessary. --> In cases where received quantity is less than ordered Vestas can set the “complete delivery flag” if no more goods are expected. This change is also sent to Schenker.
Link to Documentation; https://vestas.sharepoint.com/:p:/r/sites/OneTool-T153PLrollout/Shared%20Documents/T15%203PL%20rollout/00%20Requirements%20and%20Process/Vestas%20-%20DB%20Schenker%20Interface.pptx?d=w8ae74256aee84e64a3c4764fa3b4d8bb&csf=1&web=1&e=PhplWf
